member.name: T:ICE.GDocs.Api.Configurations.Swagger.ConfigureSwaggerOptions
member.remarks: This allows API versioning to define a Swagger document per API version after the service has been resolved from the service container.

member.name: M:ICE.GDocs.Api.Configurations.Swagger.ConfigureSwaggerOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to generate Swagger documents.

member.name: T:ICE.GDocs.Api.Configurations.Swagger.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:ICE.GDocs.Api.Configurations.Swagger.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.

member.name: M:ICE.GDocs.Api.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostEnvironment,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Configures the application using the provided builder, hosting environment, and API version description provider.
member.param: The API version descriptor provider used to enumerate defined API versions.
